artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; After a follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: dais or coffin outside of cave with small group of men seated around it; remnants of pudding and bread are on the table; two men at L with long spears full of fish and sausages, with a woman at far L holding a plate with a turkey; a cartouche of Jesus at top center with light beams, looking down at scene; two figures lying on ground in front of coffin
marks:
Inscription

bottom, in print: The Souldiers by
title: The Resurrection of Christ
